title: Add search routing documentation
description:
The old ref guide used to have a very good page which was always unpublished about search routing. 

Yesterday I wanted to point a user to it and then realized it's not present in the new ref guide . Cassandra pointed out offline that she has a copy of this page which was never added to the new ref guide because they weren't published ever.

We should review this page and add it to the ref guide

comments.content:
I've attached the original page. 

i'll do a quick review and post an updated patch shortly.
comments.author: Varun Thacker

comments.content:
Decided to just take the information from that page and add it to an existing page

This is a good start already as users won't even know about these parameters otherwise. 

I think we can make progress here by committing this rather then striving for perfection ( beefing up debug=track etc )
comments.author: Varun Thacker

comments.content: Small update to the previous patch which adds more information around document routing
